name: Speed Gunner
description:
This action-packed is filled with upgrades, shooting and heaps of fun (and grinding). You'll have to shoot your way through enemies and collect their loot before the time runs out. And if you are fast enough, you'll get a fine bonus reward depending on how much time you spent down in the dungeon. For you know what they say, "Less time spent, more coins earned!".

You can enjoy this sweet-sweet action shooter for a the price of a mere FREE, that is right. You heard me, you can play this for free.

This was made for the "BTP Jam 3", the theme was "Less is More".
